Class Car

extends java.lang.Object
    The Car object for Automatic Traffic Magic's Simulation

    • Constructor Detail

      • Car

        public Car(double position,
           double velocity,
           Road road,
           Car leadingCar)
        Constructs a new Car object
        Parameters:
        position - the initial position of the car (simply the number of meters along the road from the road's origin)
        velocity - the initial velocity of the car (m/sec)
        road - road spawned on
        leadingCar - car that is in front of this car

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the cars velocity and position based on the frameRate and acceleration/velocity (respectively)
